mapper.insert: INSERT INTO contents(contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, passwd, word, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, rdate) VALUES(contents_seq.nextval, #{memberno}, #{cateno}, #{title}, #{content}, #{passwd}, #{word}, #{file1}, #{file1saved}, #{thumb1}, #{size1}, sysdate)
mapper.select: SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp4 FROM contents ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, rdate, LOWER(file1) as file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, mp4 FROM contents WHERE cateno = #{cateno} ORDER BY contentsno DESC
SELECT contentsno, memberno, cateno, title, content, recom, cnt, replycnt, passwd, word, rdate, file1, file1saved, thumb1, size1, map, youtube FROM contents WHERE contentsno = #{contentsno}
mapper.update: UPDATE contents SET map=#{map} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
UPDATE contents SET youtube=#{youtube} WHERE contentsno=#{contentsno}
